items.title: It’s Not Too Late to Read More Horror Before Halloween!
items.description: If you're looking to squeeze in a few extra scary stories before Halloween, here are some super short horror novels to get your scares in.

items.title: How to Create a Delicious Romance
items.description: "I spoke with the comic's creator, Peglo, for his thoughts on how to create a compelling romance — and why romance compels so many readers."

items.title: A Retelling of The Ramayana Through The Voice of One of Its Greatest Villains
items.description: This retelling centers Queen Kaikeyi in a retelling of the Ramayana, a feminist take on the Hindu epic.

items.title: The Most Read Books on Goodreads This Week
items.description: Here are the five most-read books on Goodreads this week! These are the buzziest books of the moment, from thrillers to paranormal romance.

items.title: The Great OUTdoors: Nonfiction about the Queerness of Nature
items.description: Go outside, touch grass, and read these books about the queerness of nature.
